title: Home | CSAIL Alliances
content: The system they developed eliminates a source of bias in simulations, leading to improved algorithms that can boost the performance of applications. SoftZoo is a soft robot co-design platform that can test optimal shapes and sizes for robotic performance in different environments. MIT researchers exhibit a new advancement in autonomous drone navigation, using brain-inspired liquid neural networks that excel in out-of-distribution scenarios.
